Package app

Class Player

java.lang.Object
app.Player
public class Player extends Object
Player class which represents the player with specific name, score and cards he/she playes
Since:
20/03/2025
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Gökay Gülsoy

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String playerName, String playerType)
      constructor that initializes the data fields name, and type with the given parameters
      Parameters:
      playerName - String name of the player
      playerType - String type of the player either "normal" or "dealer"

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      returns a reference to name field.
      Returns:
      String that represents player's name

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      returns the value of the score field
      Returns:
      int that represents the score of player

    • getPlayerType

      public String getPlayerType()
      returns a reference to playerType field
      Returns:
      String that represents player's type

    • getCardsInHand

      public ArrayList<Card> getCardsInHand()
      returns a reference to cardsInHand field.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Cards which represents the cards in hand

    • setScore

      public void setScore(int score)
      sets the score to given integer.
      Parameters:
      score - int that represents the score to be set

    • setPlayerType

      public void setPlayerType(String playerType)
      sets the playerType to given player type.
      Parameters:
      playerType - player type to be set which can be either "normal" or "dealer"

    • setGameMediator

      public void setGameMediator(CardGameMediator mediator)
      sets the mediator to given mediator object.
      Parameters:
      mediator - CardGameMediator to be set

    • dealCardsToStartGame

      public void dealCardsToStartGame(ArrayList<Card> deck)
      deal cards to all players at the start of the game
      Parameters:
      deck - ArrayList of Cards to be dealed by dealer to all players

      delegates dealing to CardGameMediator's dealCardsToStartGame

      See Also:
      • dealCardsToStartGame

    • takeCardFromDistributer

      public void takeCardFromDistributer(Card card)
      take card from distributer and add it to cardsInHand.
      Parameters:
      card - Card taken from dealer to be added to hand

    • clearHand

      public void clearHand()
      remove all cards in hand

    • reset

      public void reset()
      reset score and playerType data fields before starting new round

    • shuffleCards

      public ArrayList<Card> shuffleCards(ArrayList<Card> cards)
      shuffle the cards passed as parameter and return shuffled cards
      Parameters:
      cards - cards to be shuffled
      Returns:
      ArrayList that represents shuffled cards

    • dealCards

      public void dealCards(ArrayList<Card> pile, String dealingDirection)
      deal cards given as the parameter pile to all players in given dealingDirection
      Parameters:
      pile - pile of cards to be dealt among players
      dealingDirection - direction in which cards are to be dealt

    • determineNextColor

      public void determineNextColor()
      next color is determined according to color of the card that player has most cards of

    • drawCards

      public void drawCards()
      draw cards from drawPile which is determined by the amountOfCards to be drawn data field of CardGameMediator

    • checkForDrawTwoCardInHand

      public ActionCard checkForDrawTwoCardInHand()
      returns a reference to DrawTwoCard object found in cardsInHand.
      Returns:
      ActionCard object which is a reference to DrawTwoCard found in cardsInHand

    • playCard

      public void playCard(String discardPileTopCardType, String topCardColor)
      play the card according the top card of the discard pile
      Parameters:
      discardPileTopCardType - String type of the top card in discardPile
      topCardColor - String color of the top card in discardPile

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard()
      if player has no cards to play,

      player should draw card from drawPile and plays it immediately otherwise turn moves to next player

    • calculateTotalCardPoint

      public int calculateTotalCardPoint()
      returns the total point of all cards in hand
      Returns:
      int that represents the total point of cards in hand
